content:
Springfield! Unfortunately, there are several Springfields in the United States, so could you please specify which state your Springfield is in? This will help me provide more accurate and relevant route recommendations.

Assuming you're looking for flat routes with scenic views and minimal traffic, I can suggest routes that utilize parks, bike paths, and waterfront areas. MapMyRun is a great tool, and I can definitely use it to find routes for you. Alternatively, I can also use other route-finding tools like Strava, Runkeeper, or even Google Maps to suggest routes.

Once I know your Springfield's location, I can provide you with a few route options, including a 10K route to help you build on your recent achievement. I'll also offer some general tips on how to progress with your marathon training.

Please let me know your Springfield's state, and I'll get started on suggesting some great routes for you!
